SELECT last("value") FROM "openstack_compute_value" WHERE "instance" = 'total_running_instances' AND $timeFilter fill(null)
SELECT last("value") FROM "openstack_compute_value" WHERE "instance" = 'total_running_tasks' AND $timeFilter fill(null)
SELECT last("value") FROM "openstack_compute_value" WHERE "instance" = 'total_free_disk' AND $timeFilter fill(null)
SELECT last("value") FROM "openstack_compute_value" WHERE "instance" = 'total_used_disk' AND $timeFilter fill(null)
SELECT last("value") FROM "openstack_compute_value" WHERE "instance" = 'total_free_ram' AND $timeFilter fill(null)
SELECT last("value") FROM "openstack_compute_value" WHERE "instance" = 'total_used_ram' AND $timeFilter fill(null)
SELECT last("value") FROM "openstack_compute_value" WHERE "instance" = 'total_free_vcpus' AND $timeFilter fill(null)
SELECT last("value") FROM "openstack_compute_value" WHERE "instance" = 'total_used_vcpus' AND $timeFilter fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "openstack_compute_value" WHERE "instance" =~ /vcpus/ AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host", "instance" fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "openstack_compute_value" WHERE "instance" =~ /disk/ AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host", "instance" fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "openstack_compute_value" WHERE "instance" =~ /ram/ AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host", "instance" fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "openstack_nova_instances_value" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "type_instance" fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "openstack_compute_value" WHERE "instance" =~ /running/ AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host", "instance" fill(null)
SELECT last("value") FROM "openstack_nova_services_value" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY "instance", "type_instance" fill(null)
SELECT last("value"), "instance" FROM "openstack_nova_service_value" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY "host", "type_instance" fill(null)
